name: EXO
description: EXO is a legendary K-Pop boy group known for their powerful vocals, synchronized performances, and groundbreaking concepts. They're one of the best-selling Korean artists of all time.

funFacts: Oldest EXO member but looks the youngest
Known for his 'baozi' (steamed bun) cheeks
Big coffee enthusiast
Completed military service in 2020
His youthful looks have become legendary
members.bio: Xiumin is EXO's eldest member who's famous for looking the youngest. His 'baozi' cheeks and youthful appearance defy age. He's known for his love of coffee, cleanliness, and his surprisingly powerful vocals.

funFacts: His stage name 'Suho' means guardian
Known for taking care of members like a mother
Successful solo career and actor
Comes from a wealthy family
Trained for 7 years before debut
members.bio: Suho is EXO's devoted leader whose name means 'guardian.' He's known as the 'mom' of EXO for his caring nature. His successful solo album and acting career have proven his versatility beyond EXO.

funFacts: Hugely successful solo career in China
Known for his incredible work ethic
His dimple is his signature feature
Has his own studio in China
One of the most successful Chinese idols globally
members.bio: Lay is EXO's Chinese member and main dancer with a massive solo career in China. Known as the 'healing unicorn,' his dedication and hard work are legendary. His dimple and gentle personality have won hearts globally.

funFacts: His solo albums have sold millions
Known as one of the best vocalists in K-Pop
Has a puppy-like playful personality
Part of supergroup SuperM
His high notes are legendary
members.bio: Baekhyun is EXO's main vocalist and one of K-Pop's best singers. His solo albums have broken records, making him a million-selling solo artist. His playful 'beagle' personality and powerful vocals are equally beloved.

funFacts: Known for his emotional ballad vocals
Has sung numerous popular OSTs
Is married and has children
His high notes are unmatched
Very humble and down-to-earth
members.bio: Chen is EXO's main vocalist known for his emotional, powerful voice. His OSTs and ballads have topped charts. Despite controversies, his vocal abilities remain unquestioned as one of K-Pop's finest singers.

funFacts: One of the tallest K-Pop idols at 185cm
Plays multiple instruments including drums and guitar
Known for his deep voice and happy personality
Has composed and produced many songs
His smile earned him 'happy virus' nickname
members.bio: Chanyeol is EXO's main rapper and a multi-instrumentalist. At 185cm, he's one of K-Pop's tallest idols. His 'happy virus' personality, deep voice, and musical talents have made him a beloved idol and producer.

funFacts: Highly acclaimed actor with multiple movie roles
Known for his powerful, emotional vocals
Has a squishy, penguin-like appearance
Very quiet and introverted
His acting career rivals his singing career
members.bio: D.O. is EXO's main vocalist and a highly acclaimed actor. His emotional vocals and acting skills are equally celebrated. Despite his quiet, introverted nature, he shines brilliantly both on stage and screen.

funFacts: Considered one of the best dancers in K-Pop history
Global ambassador for Gucci
Has a cute, teddy bear-like off-stage personality
His stage presence is legendary
Part of supergroup SuperM
members.bio: Kai is EXO's main dancer and one of K-Pop's greatest performers. His powerful dancing and stage presence have made him legendary. Off-stage, he's known as a gentle teddy bear who loves his dogs.

funFacts: Known for his striking visuals and proportions
Has a confident 'maknae on top' personality
His wind/bubble tea obsession is iconic
Very close with his members despite seeming cold
Model-like features and runway skills
members.bio: Sehun is EXO's maknae and visual known for his stunning proportions and cold beauty. Despite seeming aloof, he's deeply attached to his members. His 'maknae on top' confidence and striking looks are iconic.

seo.title: EXO Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with EXO-L
seo.description: Create your EXO name with Baekhyun, Chanyeol, Kai, D.O., Sehun & more! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean stage names. Perfect for EXO-L fanfiction.
